title.rendered: Los mejores discos de 2016 redactor por redactor

content.rendered:
Nunca es tarde si la dicha es buena, y aunque ya os contamos cuáles eran nuestros discos favoritos, tanto nacionales como internacionales, hemos decidido publicar los tops personales de cada redactor, para que así podáis saber de donde sale semejante galimatías sonoro.

AsbestosDeaf

Tops TRUMP
1. Uškumgallu – Rotten Limbs in Dreams of Blood
2. Naðra – Allir Vegir Til Glötunar
3. Ash Borer – The Irrepasable Gate
4. Dead Cult – Dead Cult
5. Urfaust – Empty Space Meditation
6. Alkerdeel – Lede
7. Irkallian Oracle – Apollyon
8. Predatory Light – Predatory Light
9. Cobalt – Slow Forever
10. Subrosa – For This We Fought the Battle of Ages
11. Suma – The State of Things
12. Croatian Amor – Love Means Taking Action
13. Bolzer – Hero
14. Rorcal – Creon
15. Oranssi Pazuzu – Värähtelijä
16. Sinistro – Semente
17. Auroch – Mute Books
18. Genocide Organ – Obituary of the Americas
19. Fyrnask – Fórn
20. Ulver – ATGCLVLSSCAP

Tops HOGAR SOCIAL
1. Altarage – Nihl
2. Fasenuova – Aullidos Metálicos
3. Juventud Juché – Movimientos
4. Hipoxia – Si Devs Esset Occidendvs Erit
5. Antiguo Régimen – Naturaleza Fractal

 

Jorgenius

Tops TRUMP
1. ANOHNI – Hopelesness
2. Tim Hecker – Love Streams
3. Oathbreaker – Rheia
4. Bölzer – Hero
5. Vektor – Terminal Redux
6. Pallbearer – Fear & Fury
7. Naðra – Allir Vegir Til Glötunar
8. A Tribe Called Quest – We got it from here…Thank you 4 your service
9. Death Grips – Botomless Pit
10. Olafur Arnalds – Islands
11. Urfaust – Empty Space Meditation
12. Metá Metá – MM3
13. Venetian Snares – Traditional Synthetizer Music
14. Ruidosa Inmundicia – Amazing Madness Japan Tour
15. BadBadNotGood – IV
16. Oranssi Pazuzu – Värähtelijä
17. Meshuggah – Violent Sleep of Reason
18. St. Paul & The Broken Bones – Sea of Noise
19. Savages – Adore Life
20. Night Verses – Into the Vanishing Light

Tops HOGAR SOCIAL
1. Triángulo de Amor Bizarro – Salve Discordia
2. Tremenda Jauría – Mordiendo
3. Dellafuente – Ansia Viva
4. Accidente – Pulso
5. Obsidian Kingdom – A Year With No Summer
6. Miguel Grimaldo – Las aventuras de Miguel Grimaldo & Niño
7. Altarage – Nihil
8. Fasenuova – Aullidos Metálicos
9. Le Fay – La Inquilina
10. Sta – Goma

Rememorama

Tops TRUMP
1. Oranssi Pazuzu – Värähtelijä
2. David Bowie – Blackstar
3. Basement – Promise Everything
4. Dinosaur Jr. – Give A Glimpse of What Yer Not
5. Trentemoller – Fixion
6. Black Peaks – Statues
7. Death Grips – Bottomless Pit
8. Night Verses – Into The Vanishing Light
9. Metá Metá – MM3
10. Against Me! – Shape Shift With Me
11. Haken – Affinity
12. Niechec – [self-titled]
13. Radiohead – A Moon Shaped Pool
14. Giraffe Tongue Orchestra – Broken Lines
15. Two Inch Astronaut – Personal Life
16. Venetian Snares – Traditional Synthetiser Music
17. Thrice – To Be Everywhere Is To Be Nowhere
18. Savages – Adore
19. Perturbator – The Uncanny Valley
20. Badbadnotgood – IV

Tops HOGAR SOCIAL
1. Belako – Hamen
2. Obsidan Kingdom – A Year Without Summer
3. Silvia Pérez Cruz – Domus
4. Jardín de la Croix – Circadia
5. The Soulbreaker Company – La Lucha
6. Fasenuova – Aullidos Metálicos
7. Triángulo de Amor Bizarro – Salve Discordia
8. Melange – Melange
9. Altarage – Nihil
10. Cuzo – Ensalada Ovni

Tharandur

Tops TRUMP

1. Tim Hecker – Love Streams
2. Roly Porter – Third Law
3. SubRosa – For This We Fought The Battle Of Ages
4. Swans – The Glowing Man
5. Ulver – ATGCLVLSSCAP
6. David Bowie – Blackstar
7. The Hotelier – Goodness
8. Dälek – Asphalt of Eden
9. Night Verses – Into the Vanishing Light
10. Oranssi Pazuzu – Värähtelijä
11. Trentemøller – Fixion
12. Urfaust – Empty Space Meditation
13. Moderat – III
14. Oozing Wound – Whatever Forever
15. Fyrnask – Fórn
16. Yndi Halda – Under Summer
17. Inter Arma – Paradise Gallows
18.. The Field – Follower
19. Dinosaur Jr. – Give A Glimpse of What Yer Not
20. Cult of Luna & Julie Christmas – Mariner

Tops HOGAR SOCIAL
1. Dellafuente – Ansia Viva
2. Juventud Juché – Movimientos
3. Fasenuova – Aullidos metálicos
4. Balcanes – Carne Nueva
5. Le Fay – La Inquilina
6. Edu Omega – Evolución mecánica
7. Triángulo de Amor Bizarro – Salve Discordia
8. Los Ganglios – Segunda escucha
9. Miguel Grimaldo – Las aventuras de Miguel Grimaldo y Niño
10. Obsidian Kingdom – A Year Without Summer
